title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.21 - Warning signal approaching bends
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.21 - Warning signal approaching bends

State Regulations

Every float nearing a short bend in the channel where, from
the height of the banks or other cause, a float approaching from the opposite
direction cannot be seen, shall sound a long distinct signal at least one-half
mile from such point. Any float that may be approaching in the opposite
direction shall answer with a similar signal. Any person violating this section
shall be subject to a penalty not to exceed $100 for each
offense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
151.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
